projects.name: LLM God
projects.description: Desktop application to query multiple LLMs (Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, etc.) at once for the same prompt.

projects.name: Caption Image Classifier
projects.description: Full-stack web app: classify images (custom PyTorch CIFAR-100 model) + generate captions (HuggingFace via WebSockets).

projects.name: StreetFoodLove
projects.description: Yelp-style app for food truck vendors (senior capstone). UI with TypeScript/React, backend SQL + AWS integration.

projects.name: Job Screener Extension
projects.description: Chrome extension using Google Sheets API to highlight previously applied companies and avoid duplicates.

projects.name: Project Elpis
projects.description: Serverless web app that helps at-risk high school students in NYC track their career progress with teacher dashboards.

projects.name: Wordament/Wordle Clone
projects.description: Interactive word puzzle game implementing mechanics similar to Wordle and Wordament with state management.

projects.name: React Backend-Benchmarks
projects.description: A benchmarking suite to compare performance metrics of various backend frameworks (FastAPI, Express) interfacing with React.
